# Concatenating PyRanges

Two PyRanges can be concatted by using the concat function:

```{python tidy=FALSE}
import pyranges as pr

import pandas as pd

from io import StringIO

gr1 = pr.load_dataset("f1")
gr2 = pr.load_dataset("f2")

print(gr1)

print(gr2)

concatted = gr1.concat(gr2)

print(concatted)
```
